text: NGC 430 is an elliptical galaxy of type E: located in the constellation Cetus. It was discovered on October 1, 1785 by William Herschel. It was described by Dreyer as "faint, very small, round, very suddenly brighter middle similar to star." ==References== ==External links== * 0430 17851001 Category:Cetus (constellation) Category:Elliptical galaxies
title: NGC 430
